sqlMap.select: SELECT a.* , b.production_name , b.production_number , b.production_weight , b.production_size , b.freight , c.way_number , c.start_city , c.end_city , c.pick_payment, c.spot_payment, c.back_payment, d.customer_name AS deliver_name , e.customer_name AS consignee_name FROM T_Transfer_Detail a LEFT JOIN dbo.T_Way_Production b ON b.id = a.production_id LEFT JOIN dbo.T_Way_Bill c ON c.id = b.bill_id LEFT JOIN dbo.T_Cm_Customer d ON d.id = c.deliver_id LEFT JOIN dbo.T_Cm_Customer e ON e.id = c.consignee_id where $and{id = #id#} $and{main_id = #main_id#} $and{production_id = #production_id#} $and{service_no = #service_no#} $and{transfer_bill = #transfer_bill#}
sqlMap.update: update T_Transfer_Detail set id=#id# ,main_id=#main_id# ,production_id=#production_id# ,service_no=#service_no# ,transfer_bill=#transfer_bill# WHERE id = #id#
sqlMap.delete: delete FROM T_Transfer_Detail WHERE id IN(#ids#)
